= Syntax Formatting =

basic typefacing:
    * *bold text*
    * _italic text_
    * *_bold italic text_*
    * _*bold italic text*_
    * ~~strikeout text~~
    * `code (no syntax) text`
    * super^script^
    * sub,,script,,

extra flashy words:
    * TODO
    * DONE
    * STARTED
    * FIXME
    * FIXED
    * XXX
